use_case.title: Digital Biomarker Validation Strategy (DiMe V3 Framework)
use_case.summary: Structured validation of digital biomarkers following the DiMe V3 frameworkâ€”Verification, Analytical Validation, and Clinical Validationâ€”to establish regulatory-grade digital endpoints for clinical trials.

workflows.name: Digital Biomarker Validation Workflow
workflows.description: Nine-step end-to-end workflow to design, execute, and document V1-V3 validation studies aligned with FDA and DiMe V3 guidance.

tasks.title: Define Intended Use & Context of Use
tasks.objective: Clarify the digital biomarker's clinical construct, target population, endpoint classification, and regulatory pathway.
outputs: Intended Use & Context of Use Document

prompts.name: Biomarker_Intended_Use
prompts.system_prompt: You are a DTx Chief Medical Officer defining intended use for a novel digital biomarker.
prompts.user_template: Describe the {biomarker_name}, what it measures, the patient population, endpoint type, and regulatory strategy using the PICO structure.

tasks.title: Design Verification Study (V1)
tasks.objective: Plan accuracy, precision, and data-quality verification comparing the digital measure to a gold standard.
inputs: Intended Use & Context of Use Document

prompts.name: Verification_Study_Design
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Data Scientist designing a technical verification study.
prompts.user_template: Outline accuracy, precision, and robustness tests for {biomarker_name} versus {gold_standard}. Define sample size, analysis metrics (ICC, Bland-Altman), and success criteria.

tasks.title: Execute Verification & Analysis (V1)
tasks.objective: Collect data, perform statistical analyses (ICC, Bland-Altman, correlation), and document verification outcomes.

prompts.name: Verification_Data_Analysis
prompts.system_prompt: You are a data scientist analyzing digital vs. gold-standard data.
prompts.user_template: Compute ICC, bias, limits of agreement, and data-quality metrics for {biomarker_name}. Summarize pass/fail results versus targets (ICC > 0.85, missing < 10%).

tasks.title: Design Analytical Validation Study (V2)
tasks.objective: Design construct, convergent, divergent, and known-groups validity analyses for the biomarker.

prompts.name: Analytical_Validation_Design
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Clinical Research Scientist designing analytical validation.
prompts.user_template: Define study design, validity hypotheses, comparator measures, and statistical thresholds (e.g., convergent r > 0.6, divergent < 0.3) for {biomarker_name}.

tasks.title: Execute Analytical Validation (V2)
tasks.objective: Perform statistical analyses (convergent, divergent, known-groups) and interpret construct validity.

prompts.name: Analytical_Validation_Analysis
prompts.system_prompt: You are analyzing analytical validation data for a digital biomarker.
prompts.user_template: Assess convergent validity against {comparator}, divergent validity against {unrelated_measure}, and known-groups differences. Summarize statistical significance and effect sizes.

tasks.title: Design Clinical Validation Study (V3)
tasks.objective: Plan prospective clinical validation linking biomarker to clinical outcomes and treatment response.

prompts.name: Clinical_Validation_Design
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Clinical Research Scientist designing a V3 clinical validation study.
prompts.user_template: Define outcomes, study design, duration, and statistical methods to assess association of {biomarker_name} with clinical endpoints and establish MCID.

tasks.title: Execute Clinical Validation & MCID Determination
tasks.objective: Conduct V3 clinical study, analyze associations, and determine MCID using anchor- and distribution-based methods.

prompts.name: Clinical_Validation_Analysis
prompts.system_prompt: You are an Outcomes Research Scientist analyzing clinical validation data.
prompts.user_template: Assess correlation with clinical outcomes (p < 0.05), treatment responsiveness, and compute MCID using anchor-based and distribution-based methods.

tasks.title: Regulatory Strategy & Pre-Submission
tasks.objective: Develop regulatory plan and conduct FDA Pre-Submission meeting for validation acceptance.

prompts.name: Regulatory_PreSub_Plan
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Regulatory Affairs Director preparing an FDA Pre-Submission.
prompts.user_template: Draft FDA Pre-Sub questions on validation sufficiency, comparator adequacy, and endpoint acceptability. Summarize feedback plan.

tasks.title: Validation Report & Publication
tasks.objective: Consolidate all validation reports, prepare peer-reviewed manuscript, and disseminate findings.

prompts.name: Validation_Report_Publication
prompts.system_prompt: You are a Medical Writer preparing the final validation report and manuscript.
prompts.user_template: Summarize methods and results from V1-V3, align with DiMe V3 framework, and draft manuscript for npj Digital Medicine or JMIR Digital Health.
